name: Bit Zesty
tagline: We create innovative digital products and services
description:
We are a London-based innovation agency. We create human-centreddigital products. We specialize in product strategy, UX design, and web app development.
Our cross-functional team can work with you on:
User research and user testing
Digital product development
User experience design
Improving and expanding an existing application
Supporting and maintaining a digital service
All of our developers have at least 6 years experience working in Ruby on Rails, our open source development framework of choice.
We have an extensive list of clients from a wide range of sectors, including the UK Government, Healthcare Providers, Charities, and Enterprises.
If you would like our help to develop your digital product or service, get in touch with Matt, Technical Director at Bit Zesty, via our website - www.bitzesty.com
